While there's no explicit mention of harm, the feelings of being lost and alone in conjunction with a potentially volatile home environment raise concern. It suggests emotional abuse or a potentially escalating situation.

title: User Story: Violence

The text expresses feeling 'on edge' but lacks specific details suggesting intent or planning of violence, self-harm, or other critical safety risks.
